plot outline: Sivan, a widower who arrives at Sivapuram village looking for a job. He has a small daughter whom he leaves in the care of a nursery teacher, while he is at work. Sivan however falls in love with his daughter's teacher soon, as he finds quite a few similarities between her and his late wife.
title: Sivapuram
plot: Sivan, a widower who arrives at _Sivapuram_ (qv) village looking for a job. He has a small daughter whom he leaves in the care of a nursery teacher, while he is at work. Sivan however falls in love with his daughter's teacher soon, as he finds quite a few similarities between her and his late wife.
